languages.text: {n}В стакане — нечто, явно сделанное из отработанного топливного прометия. Это практически ничем не фильтрованная сивуха, которая быстро валит с ног и при регулярном употреблении превращает печень в пузырящуюся губку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В стакане — нечто, явно сделанное из отработанного топливного прометиума. Это практически ничем не нефильтрованная сивуха, которая быстро валит с ног и при регулярном употреблении превращает печень в пузырящуюся губку.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The glass contains a liquid that is clearly made from spent promethium. This is moonshine, virtually unfiltered, that quickly blows the drinker off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В стакане — нечто, явно сделанное из отработанного топливного прометия. Это практически ничем не фильтрованная сивуха, которая быстро валит с ног и при регулярном употреблении превращает печень в пузырящуюся губку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The glass's contents were clearly made from spent fuel promethium. This practically unfiltered moonshine quickly blows one off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}

{n}The glass's contents were clearly made from spent fuel promethium. This practically unfiltered moonshine quickly blows one off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}

{n}The glass contains a liquid that is clearly made from spent promethium. This is moonshine, virtually unfiltered, that quickly blows the drinker off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}

{n}The glass contains a liquid that is clearly made from spent promethium. This is moonshine, virtually unfiltered, that quickly blows the drinker off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}

{n}The glass contains a liquid that is clearly made from spent promethium. This is moonshine, virtually unfiltered, that quickly blows the drinker off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}

languages.text: {n}很显然，杯子里的液体是用钷素废料酿成的。这种私酒几乎没有经过任何过滤，很快就能让喝下它的人醉得晕头转向。如果经常喝这种酒，肝脏恐怕会变成一块冒着泡的海绵。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The glass contains a liquid that is clearly made from spent promethium. This is moonshine, virtually unfiltered, that quickly blows the drinker off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，杯子里的液体是用钷素废料酿成的。这种私酒几乎没有经过任何过滤，很快就能让喝下它的人醉得晕头转向。如果经常喝这种酒，肝脏恐怕会变成一块冒着泡的海绵。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En el vaso hay un líquido que está producido a partir de prometio. Es aguardiente casero sin filtrar que no tarda en noquear a quien lo bebe y, cuando se ingiere con frecuencia, transforma su hígado en una esponja.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The glass contains a liquid that is clearly made from spent promethium. This is moonshine, virtually unfiltered, that quickly blows the drinker off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En el vaso hay un líquido que está producido a partir de prometio. Es aguardiente casero sin filtrar que no tarda en noquear a quien lo bebe y, cuando se ingiere con frecuencia, transforma su hígado en una esponja.{/n}

languages.text: {n}グラスには明らかに使用済みのプロメチウムと思わしき液体が注がれている。この密造酒はほとんどろ過されておらず、飲んだ者の意識をすぐに飛ばすほど強力で、常飲すれば肝臓を泡だらけのスポンジに変えてしまうだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The glass contains a liquid that is clearly made from spent promethium. This is moonshine, virtually unfiltered, that quickly blows the drinker off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}グラスには明らかに使用済みのプロメチウムと思わしき液体が注がれている。この密造酒はほとんどろ過されておらず、飲んだ者の意識をすぐに飛ばすほど強力で、常飲すれば肝臓を泡だらけのスポンジに変えてしまうだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Glas enthält eine Flüssigkeit, die definitiv aus verbrauchtem Promethium gemacht wurde. Schwarzgebrannter Schnaps, praktisch ungefiltert, der den Trinker rasch von den Füßen holt und bei regelmäßigem Konsum jede Leber in einen blubbernden Schwamm verwandelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The glass contains a liquid that is clearly made from spent promethium. This is moonshine, virtually unfiltered, that quickly blows the drinker off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Glas enthält eine Flüssigkeit, die definitiv aus verbrauchtem Promethium gemacht wurde. Schwarzgebrannter Schnaps, praktisch ungefiltert, der den Trinker rasch von den Füßen holt und bei regelmäßigem Konsum jede Leber in einen blubbernden Schwamm verwandelt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le verre contient un liquide clairement préparé à base de prométhium usagé. Cet alcool de contrebande, non filtré ou presque, montera très vite à la tête de son consommateur. Ingéré de manière régulière, il transformera le foie en éponge trouée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The glass contains a liquid that is clearly made from spent promethium. This is moonshine, virtually unfiltered, that quickly blows the drinker off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le verre contient un liquide clairement préparé à base de prométhium usagé. Cet alcool de contrebande, non filtré ou presque, montera très vite à la tête de son consommateur. Ingéré de manière régulière, il transformera le foie en éponge trouée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kadehteki sıvının, kullanılmış prometyumdan üretildiği bariz. Bu sıvı pratikte hiç filtrelenmemiş, boğma bir içki. İçeni anında yamultur, düzenli olarak bünyeye alınırsa da karaciğeri fokurdayan bir süngere çevirir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The glass contains a liquid that is clearly made from spent promethium. This is moonshine, virtually unfiltered, that quickly blows the drinker off their feet and, when imbibed regularly, turns their liver into a bubbling sponge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadehteki sıvının, tüketilmiş prometyumdan üretildiği bariz. Bu sıvı, pratikte hiç filtrelenmemiş, bir boğma içki. İçeni hızlıca yamultur ve düzenli olarak bünyeye alınırsa karaciğeri delik deşik eder.{/n}
